quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

quotes.text: If you can dream it, you can do it.

quotes.text: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

quotes.text: It's kind of fun to do the impossible.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: The more you like yourself, the less you are like anyone else, which makes you unique.

quotes.text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

quotes.text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

quotes.text: Stay hungry, stay foolish.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Do one thing every day that scares you.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: Challenges are gifts that force us to search for a new center of gravity.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: Surround yourself with only people who are going to lift you higher.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.
quotes.author: James Cameron

quotes.text: Hope is a good thing, maybe the best of things, and no good thing ever dies.
quotes.author: James Cameron

quotes.text: There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
quotes.author: James Cameron

quotes.text: Persistence is very important. You should not give up unless you are forced to give up.
quotes.author: James Cameron

quotes.text: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
quotes.author: James Cameron

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Count your age by friends, not years.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Reality leaves a lot to the imagination.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Everything will be okay in the end. If it's not okay, it's not the end.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Love is the answer, and you know that for sure.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: In this life we cannot do great things. We can only do small things with great love.

quotes.text: If you judge people, you have no time to love them.

quotes.text: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.

quotes.text: Peace begins with a smile.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Happiness depends more on the inward disposition of mind than on outward circumstances.

quotes.text: A smooth sea never made a skilled sailor.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: In politics, nothing happens by accident.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.

quotes.text: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.text: Children must be taught how to think, not what to think.

quotes.text: If we are to achieve a richer culture, rich in contrasting values, we must recognize the whole gamut of human potentialities.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.text: Always be open to learning new things and trying new experiences.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.text: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.text: To travel hopefully is a better thing than to arrive.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.text: Keep your fears to yourself, but share your courage with others.

quotes.text: The world is so full of a number of things, I'm sure we should all be as happy as kings.

quotes.text: Life is not a matter of holding good cards, but of playing a poor hand well.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Do what you feel in your heart to be right, for you'll be criticized anyway.

quotes.text: Happiness is not a goal; it is a by-product.

quotes.text: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.

quotes.text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Well done is better than well said.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy, and wise.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: An unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Education is the kindling of a flame, not the filling of a vessel.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Strong minds discuss ideas, average minds discuss events, weak minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened.

quotes.text: What we think, we become.

quotes.text: Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere.

quotes.text: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.

quotes.text: The time is always right to do what is right.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.

quotes.text: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

quotes.text: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.

quotes.text: It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see.

quotes.text: Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies ahead of us are tiny matters compared to what lives within us.

quotes.text: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.

quotes.text: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.

quotes.text: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.

quotes.text: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.

quotes.text: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

quotes.text: Life is a journey, not a destination.

quotes.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.

quotes.text: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

quotes.text: He who learns but does not think, is lost. He who thinks but does not learn is in great danger.

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.

quotes.text: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.

quotes.text: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

quotes.text: The best revenge is massive success.

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

quotes.text: It is never too late to be what you might have been.

quotes.text: Happiness depends upon ourselves.

quotes.text: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.

quotes.text: Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.
